issue.title: [Ruby] Add support for S3FileSystem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Would be great to support S3 store, as it is one of the widely used stores nowadays

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14563?focusedCommentId=17438301) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
This is already implemented.
